label: Fairy Changelings
column5: A woman from the neighbourhood of Newcastle Emlyn left her baby in a cradle only to find it replaced by a strange
column6: old-looking changeling after seeking the help of a wizard
column7: who used fearful tactics to reclaim the real child. The tale highlights the belief in Fairies stealing unbaptized infants and outlines a ritual where mothers threw changelings into rivers to recover their true babies.
